meta.title: E2E Christmas Campaign Email Sequence Test

blocker_resolved.testing_mode_fix: Load TESTING_MODE inside async context with sync Secret.load()

wave8_issues.issue_2: Template variables not filled: Email #1 showed ${{TotalRevenueLeak}} instead of calculated value

Verify at least 3 workers are active and healthy
Check worker CPU/memory capacity via Prefect dashboard
Calculate concurrent flow capacity: each worker can handle 10-20 concurrent flows
Verify 50-100 concurrent signups can be handled (3 workers * ~30 flows each = 90+ capacity)

features.name: Verify workers are healthy and connected to production Prefect (prefect.galatek.dev)

session_log.action: CRITICAL BUG DIAGNOSED: Python 3.12 + uvloop crash

details.root_cause: Python 3.12 deprecated get_child_watcher(), uvloop triggers this
details.fix: pip uninstall uvloop -y && pkill -f 'prefect worker' && prefect worker start --pool default &
